website_summaries.verdict: A simple shaker-style bench that looks good stained or unstained.
pros: This easy-to-assemble bench is plain, giving you the choice of staining or adding a cushion
When stained, the grain of the wood is brought out nicely
Measures 47 inches by 14.4 inches deep by 18.7 inches high
cons: If you're not up for a bit of sanding, you might want something that comes finished

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. An excellent option for those willing to do a little work and save a lot of money. Paired well with the C-2P Pair of Madrid Chairs. Overall, very pleased! In case anyone is wondering, stained with varathane’s carbon gray, sanded to give the distressed/worn look and then topped the varathanes water based polyurethane (satin).
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Custom bench turned out beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a colorful bench to go beneath a kitchen window but couldn't find the right color in the right size. We purchased this unfinished bench and painted it in three colors to match the Southwestern fabric I chose. A local seamstress made the cushion. It turned out beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: WBC

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: (Same review for other bench purchased at same time; same origin, same quality!) Absolutely LOVE this piece! Solid wood, no MDF junk, heavy, easy to put together, no hardware missing, holes and screws match. Bought two benches, both made in Vietnam, and wish I had five thumbs to give them five thumbs up! Well, five stars will do! Highly recommended! And yes, it is unfinished and you can give it any treatment you like. Also well packaged. A breath of fresh air when compared with all the poor quality stuff made in China that has taken over Amazon over the last few years! Did I say I highly recommend it?!
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Exactly as advertised. Easy to assemble, (all parts inclused all parts matched up) Lovely natural wood will only need a clear stain. Very sturdy. Will also do double duty as a power bench. I am so pleased. Will probably order a third. Thank you. Restores my faith in ordering from Amazon. Have not had very good results in the past six months.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous kaleidoscope
customer_reviews.text: Solid, heavy, ridiculously easy build (The instructions are laughable; "Step One" is the ONLY step.) When it arrives it's plain, boring, raw. When you stain it, something happens. The uniform blandness gives way to gorgeous hues and grains, dark and light elements of the wood emerge to reveal a deep, warm, rich kaleidoscope of beauty. It looks much, much more expensive than its modest price. I'd never stained before--what seemed intimidating was actually really easy (Old white t-shirt to apply stain, small foam roller for clearcoat. And wear those throwaway thin latex gloves). Do stain, even a light natural, and clearcoat to protect. Give this wood the respect it deserves.
customer_reviews.author: scw201

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My New Dining Det!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench.I needed a bench for my dining set I just purchased. I didn't want to go with the standard 6 chairs. The bench came and only took a few minutes (less than 15 minutes) to put together. I did a light sanding, and covered with a poly to keep in great condition. ay stain a different color after the holidays. This bench is strong!
customer_reviews.author: kelleysdiy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I bought two benches and both are identical (sometimes the wood grains look different, but not these!) Products were both packaged securely and arrived together. Note the boxes are heavy so you may need help moving them or you could open the box and bring in the pieces separately. The pieces were smooth and did not need additional sanding. Assembly was very easy and I both done easily in 20 minutes. I used chalk paint on the legs and trim. Very happy with product and outcome!
customer_reviews.author: CME Shop

customer_reviews.title: Quality Furniture. So Easy to Assemble. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most well-packed furniture of all times for me. Engineering absolutely had ease of unpacking and ease of assembly with the consumer in mind. I was WOWED. It's a sturdy, quality bench. I'm an older gal. Assembly was super easy and took me no time at all. Everything needed to quickly assemble is included. I will try to purchase more unfinished furniture from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Unfinished, but a nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bench. I am using it as a display table of sorts. One thing to note, you will want to put some kind of finish on this. You could paint it, however, I chose to finish it with tung oil. Tung oil will make it water resistant. It also allows the wood grain to stand out. Over time the color will darken and show off the grain.
customer_reviews.author: Ken J.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bench
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed for an odd length dining table. I did stain it but it was smooth enough that there wasn't a need to sand it first. No issues with missing hardware, no cracks and all predrilled holes lined up correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Resists polyurethane and component cracked
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these benches. One, no problem. The second had one board that would not take....i.e. resisted the polyurethane. When assembling the bench, a side piecr underneath cracked. This cannot be seen from above but I question its stablilty as a seat. I discovered these flaws after a lot of money, time and energy was spent on the turquoise inlay. Amazon would replace the bench if I returned the original. Not going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a oconnor

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is such a substantial piece of furniture--sturdy, easy to put together, and so smooth and truly lovely. I won't/wouldn't want to add any stain or color to it. I got it as a table for working on (non-wet!) art projects while sitting on the floor. I love natural wood and am so pleased with the whole piece--my compliments and thanks to the makers.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne T.

customer_reviews.title: Bench ready
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I am very happy with the bench. I was skeptical on ordering and was worried on how cheaply made it would be. But It came in today and I am very happy with not only the quality of the wood but how nice it looks once it was put together. I cant wait to stain the top and paint the legs to match the kitchen table. I even told my husband lets order another for the other side of the table .
customer_reviews.author: Michele R.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, sturdy legs, Wood color is as shown in the picture and is very beautiful. Assembly was quick and easy, just screw in the 4 legs. I am pleased! The picture I added shows the size of the bench relative to a king bed.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug87

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy and ready to stain. Assembly was really easy and it came with the small tool to do so. Very hefty, solid wood so we’ll worth the value. Delivery was also very fast, arriving two days before expected.
customer_reviews.author: Junk2art

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product. It is truly "unfinished"
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product. It is truly "unfinished", however, you must put a penetrating stain and sealer on it. I used Minwax Wood Finish Natural 209. In an 8 oz. can there is enough for up to 4 coats. I followed this by a Minwax Polyurethane , clear satin finish... again 3 coats. You may use a brush on the stain but, for sure, use a sponge-on-a-stick applicator for the polyurethane. This rubber tree wood from spent plantation trees in Southeast Asia is lovely. It is very blonde but has some light brown and reddish grain tones to it.
customer_reviews.author: TJDR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised at the quality of this bench. It looks good, is easy to assemble, and I'm sure will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bench
customer_reviews.text: Real wood, very well made, looks great, very sturdy, can paint or stain. Can be put and used in so many different places in your home. Great size. Excellent price. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CWood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to put together. Wood is a hard I believe pine. High quality. I am looking at buying another one for my sun room. I painted the bench came out nice. The next one I will be staining as it will be in located where I entertain. The packaging was Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bear 44

customer_reviews.title: Remarkably well made
customer_reviews.text: The value, including ease of assembly made this an outstanding purchase. Manufactured in Viet Nam / worth more than twice the price to me if it were once again made in America. In the mean time, chances you'll be pleased with the workmanship and the appearance. Extremely sturdy, but can be assembled by anyone with averages size and strength. Assembly tool included.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Cubfan

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great product that you can easily make your own. I bought this table without the chairs because I didn’t like them and found these benches. After a little trial and error, I was able to easily match them up to my table. Love these benches and plan to do two more for the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Heather  B

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised---
customer_reviews.text: Another fine product from this supplier, ordered 2 products from them, both are right price point, good quality, easy assembly, ---nothing ever 5 stars until having proven it over time through use !
customer_reviews.author: TDC

customer_reviews.title: Great value great quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow this bench is exactly what I was looking for! I’m using it in my kitchen table ! The quality of the wood is great. I’m very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and super sturdy. My two rambunctious kids (2 and 6) ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and super sturdy. My two rambunctious kids (2 and 6) have been pretty rough with this bench and it still sturdy. It is definitely unfinished, but I like that look. It might help to put a sealer on it to wipe off food and what not. So easy to assemble as well. Great customer service. I had concerns about two of the four legs--looked like some splitting from the screw. Customer service shipped new legs within two days.
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Obsessed with how nice everything turned out! Highly recommend!!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for our dining table. Beautiful wood and extremely sturdy!

customer_reviews.title: I love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: I painted it white to match my dining set and couldn't be happier. Smooth wood, sturdy design, super easy to assemble. I had seen it at a friend's house and loved the shape, so I bought one myself! Easily fits three small children or two adults for big families.
customer_reviews.author: Will Perkins

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT! IMPRESSIVE quality
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bench his sz, researched for weeks, found this to be the best one for the money. It was packaged VERY well and super easy to put together. It is solid wood and the quality of it is GREAT. I still need to stain it, but super pleased with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Love these

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully sturdy addition at our kitchen table and the other one at the foot of our bed.  Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love the solid, heavy, sturdiness of these beautifully crafted benches. Just a few pieces to put together and this wonderful piece will last a lifetime. It is wonderful as is and we felt there was no need to stain or paint although it would look beautiful no matter how you chosde to finish it.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have anything negative to say. Looks nice and was easy to put together. So far, has been sturdy and works well with my table.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This bench met all my expectations and more! Great craftsmanship, easy to assemble-had it put together in five minutes, loved that it was unfinished so I could stain the seat and paint the legs to match my dining table.

customer_reviews.title: Smart size; solidly made
customer_reviews.text: Under a window in the kitchen in the sort-of entranceway from door to kitchen proper. And this uses the space smartly. Deep enough for sitting, packages, newspapers, etc. Yet allowing of room for walking by. Feels very good in both height and in solidity.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Trudeau

customer_reviews.title: Takes several coats of paint
customer_reviews.text: So far 1 coat of primer and 2 coats of paint. Wood still showing through. Ugh
customer_reviews.author: LGreenwell

customer_reviews.title: It is extremely easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bench is made very well. It is extremely easy to assemble. I did have difficulty staining the bench. I attempted to stain with oil based stain and it did not stain evenly. I had to sand down to the bear wood twice. I finally was able to achieve a good result using General Finishes gel based stain. I looks very nice now. I wouldn't recommend staining with oil based stain.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Excellent quality. Real wood. I’m working in getting it stained now. Fits perfectly our dining table.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Carolyn O
customer_reviews.text: What can I say I love love love international concepts. This furniture is very well-made. It takes staining and painting very well. PS I stained my pieces the top walnuts and I painted it white my brother did not believe that I did it he thought it was high-end furniture.
customer_reviews.author: CarolynO.

customer_reviews.title: Least expensive sturdy bench I’ve seen!
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy. Simple to put together. I painted mine to match our board and batten

customer_reviews.text: This bench is VERY sturdy and super easy to put together. Wood is smooth and ready to paint. My only issue is that it was missing a single nut so I can't really finish putting it together until I run to the hardware store to purchase one. Sort of a hassle....

customer_reviews.text: So many compliments on this bench. It’s simple and pretty. I’ve left it unfinished for now.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, thick strong legs
customer_reviews.text: this bench is awesome, exactly what we wanted . you will not be disappointed. the best feature is the very very thick legs way thicker than we expected.we are extremely happy with the purchase. it really is very well made.this is one review that I am happy to share my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: larry m.

customer_reviews.title: great benches
customer_reviews.text: We love our benches. We had them professionally finished to match our dining table. They get lots of use and are sturdy. I had thought of finishing them myself, but let a pro do it after learning that rubberwood can be tricky to stain. (that and I didn't have the time or space:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdily built and made with nice wood that I oiled with an oak-colored stain to ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, lovely design. Just what I needed for my small home-entry space to sit on when putting on or taking off shoes that I keep underneath the bench. It is sturdily built and made with nice wood that I oiled with an oak-colored stain to bring out the grain and make it shine. The only thing I had to put together were the 4 legs and that took all of 5 minutes as hardware and tools are included. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy and I like the way I can varnish or paint to my taste

customer_reviews.text: Top is made of assortment of pieces, not a solid board, or even a few pieces of same length.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a great price.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful solid wood
customer_reviews.text: would buy another product from company in a heart beat

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, sleek, solid purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful bench! We ordered two. Took about 20 minutes to assemble both benches. Sturdy, sleek, great height and width. Really happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and solid wood contruction. Great value and most friends can’t believe the price I laid. Really happy with purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match for Our New Table
customer_reviews.text: We had bought a new kitchen table that did not have a bench available as an option. We bought two chairs with it, but wanted a bench since the table is usually up against our wall. I bought this bench, stained it to match the table, and it does the trick. Now when the grandkids are over, we pull the table away from the wall and the bench is there for them..

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Though simple....Pretty wood piece. Will order another one.

customer_reviews.title: but it's perfect! Solid wood
